about_the_game:
"Don't Let It Die" smoothly transitions from board game to the digital world, offering a dramatic survival experience with strategic depth. It combines tribe building, resource management and adaptability in a compact, engaging, replayable experience.

The adventure begins with a momentous event: a lightning strike igniting a lone tree, bestowing your tribe with the gift of fire. This monumental discovery becomes the cornerstone of your survival. Immerse yourself in a prehistoric world where your tribe's fate hangs in the balance, faced with the relentless threats of a bygone era.

Hunger, predators, and the unforgiving elements are formidable foes, but the battle to keep the flame alive against all odds adds a vital layer to your strategic considerations. Will you prioritize gathering food, fueling the ever hungry flame, or crafting vital tools and weapons? Each decision could mean the difference between the prosperity and the extinction of your tribe.

This is a free DEMO - Experience the core mechanics and embark on the initial phase of your tribe's journey with the demo version. The Demo includes 6 Tribe Members and 2 Fire Knowledge Tree Difficulties.


DEMO KEY FEATURES


  • 6 Unique Characters, Endless Strategies

    Dive into a rich tapestry of survival strategies with 6 distinct characters, each boasting their own skills and specialties. With over 2,380 potential team combinations in the full game, the possibilities are limitless. Experiment to discover the most effective synergy for your tribe and pave your way to victory.

  • Resource Management at Its Finest

    Venture into the untamed wilderness to gather essential resources - berries, plant fiber, rocks, meat, wood, hide, and bone. Strategic efficiency is key to managing these scarce commodities effectively. Leverage the unique abilities of your characters, equip them with crafted items, and unlock new discoveries to fully harness their potential.

  • Fire Discoveries - The Path to Victory

    The heart of your tribe's survival lies in the mysteries of fire. Choose from 2 Fire Knowledge Tree difficulties and embark on a quest to unveil its secrets before it's too late. Earn Fire Knowledge Points (FKP) through investigating the fire and spend them on breakthrough discoveries. Achieving the ultimate knowledge, "Fire Starter," signifies your triumph over nature's challenges and the birth of civilization as we know it.

  • Master Craftsmanship for Survival

    Your survival arsenal includes an array of tools, weapons, and buildings - each indispensable in your quest for survival. Craft what you need to gather resources, fend off predators, and bolster your tribe's chances of survival. From simple stone tools to elaborate shelters, what you create will shape your tribe's destiny.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or later, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
